description:
Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 SP1 w/ MFC Security Update Redistributable, both x86 & x64 variant, version 10.0.40219.325

      The Visual C++ redistributable packages, also known as VCredist, are runtime components in support of applications compiled with Microsoft Visual Studio. The x86 distributions are for 32-bit applications; the x64 versions are for 64-bit applications. The version needed depends on the version of Visual Studio that was used to compile the application.
      On 64-bit operating system, this package will install both 32-bit (x86) and 64-bit (x64) versions of Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable. 32-bit operating system will only get x86 version.

      This is the latest version of Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable. Read more: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2019667

      NOTE: This package contains a valid automatic uninstall procedure, so you don't need to manually reverse whatever actions installer did.
      NOTE: Phrase « Devbox » in a name of this package is used as signature to indicate high quality standards. Functionally, the package is the same as any other Chocolatey package.
summary: Runtime components of Visual C++ Libraries required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer that does not have Visual C++ 2010 installed.
author: Microsoft
